meanings.definition: A person who maintains a golf course.
meanings.sent1: The greenkeepers work hard to keep the golf course looking beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The greenkeepers mow the grass and tend to the plants on the golf course.
meanings.sent3: The greenkeepers joked that they were the real MVPs of the golf course.
meanings.sent4: The greenkeepers are the unsung heroes behind the scenes of the golf course.
meanings.sent5: The greenkeepers' dedication to their work is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals responsible for caring for the grounds of a golf course.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the greenkeepers gather to discuss the maintenance tasks for the day.
meanings.sent2: The greenkeepers coordinate their efforts to ensure the golf course is in top condition.
meanings.sent3: During the staff party, the greenkeepers showed off their dance moves on the golf course.
meanings.sent4: The greenkeepers are like the guardians of the golf course, protecting it from wear and tear.
meanings.sent5: The greenkeepers' teamwork is essential for the upkeep of the golf course.
